imdb.plot outline: Most of us barely understand connectivity technology and how it really affects us. We break it down by going to the tech savvy centers of Singapore, Seoul, and San Francisco, to find out how the convergence of internet, television, mobile and wifi will affect our lives if we get truly connected.
imdb.title: Digital Deconstruction
plot: Most of us barely understand connectivity technology and how it really affects us. We break it down by going to the tech savvy centers of Singapore, Seoul, and San Francisco, to find out how the convergence of internet, television, mobile and wifi will affect our lives if we get truly connected.::Infocus Asia
